item.title: How to Deploy Nebula Graph on Kubernetes
item.description: What is Kubernetes Kubernetes (commonly stylized as k8s) is an open-source container-orchestration system, aiming to provide a simple yet efficient platform forÂ automating deployment, scaling, and operations of application containers across clusters of hosts. Kubernetes has a series of components architecturally, enabling a mechanism that can provide deployment, maintenance, and extension of applications. The components are designed to be loosely coupled and scalable so that they can meet various kinds of workloads.
